articles.title: U.S. Secretary of State's Remarks Slammed by DPRK Foreign Ministry
articles.content:
U.S. Secretary of State's Remarks Slammed by DPRK Foreign Ministry
 Pyongyang, June 30 (KCNA) -- A spokesman of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea gave the following answer to a question raised by KCNA on June 30 with regard to the "2017 Trafficking in Persons Report" published by the U.S., in which it took issue with the DPRK:
					 The U.S., unanimously condemned by the international community as the world's worst wilderness of human rights and kingpin of human trafficking crime, again talked nonsense about the fabricated situation of "trafficking in persons" of other countries, behaving impertinently as if it were a "human rights judge".
					
					 In particular, the U.S. Secretary of State Tillerson nowadays keeps making abusive remarks about the DPRK whenever he opens his mouth and this time he uttered malicious words such as "forced labor" about the DPRK workers who are serving abroad under the legal contracts with respective countries.
					
					 This fully shows to what extent the reckless maneuvers of the Trump administration have gone in its attempt to isolate and stifle the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. secretary of state will only earn the fame of an ignorant person who has completely lost the sense of reality if he thinks they can frighten the DPRK with the "human rights" racket and the game of sanctions.
					
					 The ragtag team of Trump including Tillerson may vociferate about "human rights" until their throats go sore and cling desperately on to the sanctions campaign, the DPRK simply regards it as the last-ditch effort by those in their last breath and as a shriek of fear by those who are scared of the power of the DPRK that grows with each passing day.
					
					 The Trump team should learn a due lesson from the Obama group that took a crushing blow when they impudently attempted to offend the supreme dignity of the DPRK, trumpeting about the "human rights".
					
					 The U.S. should clean its own filthy land, the den of evils, where all sorts of crimes including murder, mugging and human trafficking are rampant, instead of running foolish and amuck to preach the world with the bunch of rubbish titled "Report on Trafficking in Persons" that they fabricate every year with so much zeal and energy.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK are vigilantly following the morbid confrontational hysteria of the Trump team, which is growing reckless against the DPRK, and are fully determined to mercilessly sweep away all the gang of evils including Tillerson.
					
					 The U.S. would be well advised to behave with discretion for its own good.

articles.title: KAHRS Spokesman Hits Anti-DPRK Human Rights Campaign
articles.content:
KAHRS Spokesman Hits Anti-DPRK Human Rights Campaign
 Pyongyang, June 30 (KCNA) -- A spokesman of the Korean Association for Human Rights Studies gave the following answer raised by KCNA on June 30 as regards the reckless remarks with ulterior political purposes made by the "International Coalition to Stop Crimes against Humanity in North Korea" severely distorting the reality of the DPRK:
					 Recently a member of the "International Coalition to Stop Crimes against Humanity in North Korea", an anti-DPRK plot-breeding organization, prattled that majority of equipment used in the Masikryong Ski Resort was purchased in violation of the UN sanctions, "child slavery labor" was used in the operation of the Ski Resort and that 30 young people died in a bus accident on their way to the resort. This is a complete fabrication.
					
					 Such groundless lies, made unhesitatingly towards the International Olympic Committee and the international community at large, are an unpardonably despicable act.
					
					 If the ski equipment used by our people of all walks of life in the Masikryong Ski Resort which is popular as in many other countries was introduced in the DPRK in violation of the UN sanctions, those sanctions themselves constitute extra-large crimes against humanity which obstruct physical advancement and civilized life of the popular masses.

articles.title: S. Korean Ultra-right Conservative Organizations Must be Sternly Punished
articles.content:
S. Korean Ultra-right Conservative Organizations Must be Sternly Punished
 Pyongyang, June 30 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Consultative Council for National Reconciliation issued a statement Friday in connection with the mounting curse and rejection of the public of all circles against the ultra-right conservative organizations that have faced the crisis of total collapse along with the ruin of the worst dragon lady traitor Park Geun Hye.
					 As known, during the rule by traitor Park, the ultra-right conservative forces justified her group's traitorous policy, viciously slandered the struggle of the south Koreans for the right to existence and democracy and did not hesitate bullying acts under the auspice of the power, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 The ultra-right conservative forces, in particular, viciously slandered the DPRK and went hell-bent on the racket for "eliminating the pro-north leftist forces", working as a cat's paw of traitor Park Geun Hye in kicking up the row for confrontation with the DPRK.
					
					 It is quite natural that the ultra-right conservative forces, which had resorted to all sorts of wild acts while challenging the public, have faced the crisis of disbandment, being branded as the target of abolition under the unanimous wish of the south Koreans.
					
					 Whenever Park faced serious ruling crisis, she called on "all conservative forces to pool efforts to tackle the problem" and called for "getting ready to battle the leftist organizations' pro-north and anti-government actions". She issued the order of "all-out mobilization" to the conservative organizations and annually funded them millions of U.S. dollars she took from big businesses, egging them on to "control demonstration".
					
					 The riff-raffs, matchless human scum, insulted the public mind-set, being locked in the dog's fight to get more money from Chongwadae.
					
					 It is quite natural that the conservative riff-raffs which sought only power and benefits, being lost to human conscience and face, are now dispersed, looking for a way-out just like cockroaches with their jobs lost along with the ruin of the traitor.
					
					 The collapse and disbandment of the despicable conservative forces are a natural result meted out to human rejects who prolong their remaining days with sycophancy and treachery, wild act of escalating confrontation with the fellow countrymen and blind pursuance of power.
					
					 Odorous rubbish must be buried in time.
					
					 The statement stressed the need to probe the truth behind the despicable traitorous and unpopular acts committed by the ultra-right conservative organizations, not just the hideous crimes by Park Geun Hye-Choe Sun Sil group that shocked the public, and mete out stern punishment of history to them.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets President of Sudan
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets President of Sudan
 Pyongyang, June 30 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Friday sent a message of greeting to Omar Hassan Ahmed Al-Bashir, president of the Republic of Sudan, on the occasion of the day of the Sudan revolution.
					 The message sincerely wished the president and government of Sudan bigger successes in their works for defending peace and stability of the country and achieving the economic development.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets President of DR Congo
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets President of DR Congo
 Pyongyang, June 30 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, sent a message of greeting to Joseph Kabila Kabange, president of the Democratic Republic of Congo, on June 30 on the occasion of the 57th anniversary of its independence.
					 The message expressed full support and solidarity with the people of DR Congo in the struggle to achieve peace, stability and development of the country under the wise leadership of the president while resolutely frustrating the outsiders' pressure and interference.
					
					 It expressed belief that the relations of friendship and cooperation between the DPRK and DR Congo would strengthen in various fields, wishing the president of DR Congo good health and bigger success in his responsible work.

articles.title: Russian Delegation of Young Communist League Here
articles.content:
Russian Delegation of Young Communist League Here 
 Pyongyang, June 30 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Lenin Young Communist League of the Russian Federation led by First Secretary of its Central Committee Vladimir Isakov who is secretary of the C.C., Communist Party of the Russian Federation, arrived here Friday.

articles.title: DPRK Players Back Home
articles.content:
DPRK Players Back Home
 Pyongyang, June 30 (KCNA) -- DPRK players came back home Friday after taking part in the 2017 Irtyshskiye Zory international games.
					 In the games held in Kazakhstan from June 25 to 27 with the attendance of more than 120 men and women players from the DPRK, Russia, Uzbekistan and other countries and regions, DPRK players bagged two gold and two bronze medals at the trampoline gymnastics.

articles.title: Bangladesh Award Diplomas to Great Men of Mt Paektu
articles.content:
Bangladesh Award Diplomas to Great Men of Mt Paektu
 Pyongyang, June 30 (KCNA) -- The Bangladeshi Preparatory Committee for Gathering 2017-Praise to the Great Persons of Mt Paektu and the Bangladesh-Korea Friendship and Solidarity Committee on June 12 decided to award diplomas to President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					 MD. Harun-Ar-Rashid, chairman of the preparatory committee and chairman of the friendship and solidarity committee, said that the Gathering-Praise to the Great Persons of Mt Paektu is a world-wide political festival to highly praise the immortal feats they performed for the Korean revolution and global independence.
					
					 He said that it is high honor to have decided to award the diplomas to the great men of Mt Paektu with the gathering as an occasion.

articles.title: Sports Contest for Songun Torch Prize Closes
articles.content:
Sports Contest for Songun Torch Prize Closes
 Hamhung, June 30 (KCNA) -- The Sports Contest for Songun Torch Prize closed with due ceremony at Hamhung Stadium Friday.
					 South Hamgyong Province came first in total standings.
					
					 Present at the ceremony were Kim Song Il, chairman of the South Hamgyong Provincial Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Kim Pong Yong, chairman of the Provincial People's Committee, officials concerned, sportspersons and others.
					
					 At the ceremony, a rotating trophy cup and medals were awarded to organizations and players who proved successful.

articles.title: DPRK People Vow to Impose Death Penalty on Criminals
articles.content:
DPRK People Vow to Impose Death Penalty on Criminals
 Pyongyang, June 30 (KCNA) -- The joint statement issued by the Ministry of State Security, the Ministry of People's Security and the Central Public Prosecutors Office of the DPRK arouses popular indignation at traitor Park Geun Hye, ex-Director of the puppet Intelligence Service Ri Pyong Ho and other riff-raffs of south Korea who hatched and pressed for the heinous plot to hurt the supreme leadership of the DPRK.
					 In this regard, Pak Chol Min, secretary of the Central Committee of the Kimilsungist-Kimjongilist Youth League, told KCNA:
					
					 The joint statement makes me tremble with wrath.
					
					 It is the unanimous will of our young vanguards to devotedly defend the leadership of the revolution.
					
					 Our huge army of young people will find out the scum wherever they hide and make them pay dear price for their reckless act without fail.
					
					 There will be no place for those monsters to be safe under the sky.
					
					 Han Kyong Ae, chairwoman of the Unha Co-op Farm in Onchon County, said:
					
					 I can hardly repress my surging indignation at the vermin like Park Geun Hye and Ri Pyong Ho.
					
					 We, farmers, are unanimous in our determination to mangle them and bury them in a manure sink.
					
					 And we will emerge victorious in the on-going campaign for preventing drought damage and bring in rich harvest with the mind of meting out merciless punishment to those criminals, thus making a contribution to defending the dignity of the supreme leadership and our socialism.

articles.title: Terrorists Should Be Put to Death Penalty: DPRK Citizens
articles.content:
Terrorists Should Be Put to Death Penalty: DPRK Citizens
 Pyongyang, June 30 (KCNA) -- The Ministry of State Security, the Ministry of People's Security and the Central Public Prosecutors Office of the DPRK recently released a joint statement to impose death penalty on Park Geun Hye and other criminals of hideous state-sponsored terrorism who pushed forward the operation of "removing the north's leadership" and hatched the heinous plot to hurt the supreme leadership of the DPRK according to its Criminal Code. 
					 In this regard, Kim Chol, a researcher of the Law Institute of the Academy of Social Sciences, told KCNA:
					
					 Clearly stipulated in the DPRK Criminal Code is that all those who organized, took part or pursued state-sponsored terrorism targeting the supreme leadership of the DPRK are subject to criminal prosecution irrespective of nationality and that no statute of limitations is applicable to such crime.
					
					 There is no place for devilish homicides to be safe under the sky, as they dare challenge the supreme leadership, the life and soul of DPRK people, and hatch the assassination plot against it.
					
					 In support of the joint statement representing the surging indignation of servicepersons and people of the DPRK, we strongly demand that immediate death penalty be put on Park Geun Hye, ex-Director of the puppet Intelligence Service Ri Pyong Ho and their clique in the name of the DPRK Criminal Code and in the name of justice and conscience.
					
					 Han Kwang Chol, a teacher at Kim Chaek University of Technology, said:
					
					 All teachers and students of the university got so enraged as to swear to mercilessly punish all the homicides challenging the supreme dignity of the DPRK to the last one.
					
					 We, teachers, will fulfill our mission and duty in bringing up students to be vanguards who devotedly defend the supreme leadership and the destiny of the country and nation.

articles.title: Campaign for Watering Croplands Brisk in DPRK
articles.content:
Campaign for Watering Croplands Brisk in DPRK
 Pyongyang, June 30 (KCNA) -- A campaign for preventing damage from drought is going on in the DPRK. Recently, committees, ministries and national institutions and industrial establishments in Pyongyang City sent hundreds of water-supply vehicles and pumping equipment to South Hwanghae Province, a granary of the country.
					 Hundreds hectares of paddy fields are irrigated by water-supply vehicles, mobile water pumps, sprayers, etc. on a daily average.
					
					 Taking the lead in this campaign are officials and working people of the State Planning Commission, the State Commission of Quality Management, the Rungnado and Kyonghung guidance bureaus, the Ministry of Mining Industry, the Ministry of Food Procurement and Administration and the General Bureau for Affairs with Diplomatic Corps.

articles.title: Chima and Jogori, Traditional Costume of Koreans
articles.content:
Chima and Jogori, Traditional Costume of Koreans
Pyongyang, June 30 (KCNA) -- From olden times, the Korean women have liked to put on chima (skirt) and jogori (jacket).
					Dr. Jo Hui Nam, section chief of the Folklore Institute under the Academy of Social Sciences of the DPRK, told KCNA that chima and jogori is peculiar in shape, elegant in pattern and beautiful in color.
					
					Jogori is short in length and tight in width, but chima is long and broadens toward the bottom, he said, adding: 
					
					Splendid patterns like cloud, grapes, crane and small flowers and elegant harmony of colors add beauty to Chima and jogori which show well the superiority of the national costume.

articles.title: Big Stride Made in Improving Evodia Daniellii in DPRK
articles.content:
Big Stride Made in Improving Evodia Daniellii in DPRK
 Pyongyang, June 30 (KCNA) -- A big stride has been made in improving Evodia daniellii in the DPRK.
					 According to Ri Hyon Song, director of the Economic Forest Institute under the Academy of Forest Science, ten cities and counties have finished grafting high-yielding branches in nearly 2 000 hectares of Evodia daniellii forests.
					
					 The Evodia daniellii forest station in Sohung County, North Hwanghae Province secured several tons of seeds and supplied myriads of high-yielding scions to the Evodia daniellii forest stations across the country, he said, adding:
					
					 Cities and counties in North Phyongan Province have created high-yielding Evodia daniellii forests and nipped off extra sprouts and trimmed the branches in a scientific way.
					
					 Meanwhile, South Hamgyong and South Phyongan provinces have also ameliorated a large number of Evodia daniellii.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Blasts Terror Plotters
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Blasts Terror Plotters
 Pyongyang, June 30 (KCNA) -- The hideous state-sponsored acts of terrorism against the supreme headquarters of the DPRK have been recently revealed one after another to infuriate all the servicepersons and civilians of the DPRK.
					 In the wake of the arrest of a heinous terrorist group who were infiltrated into the DPRK by CIA of the U.S. and the south Korean Intelligence Service to commit state-sponsored terrorism against the supreme leadership of the DPRK with chemical substance, it was disclosed that Park Geun Hye together with the IS pressed for an operation for "eliminating the leadership of the north" during her tenure.
					
					 This can never be pardoned as it was the worst provocation to remove the priceless spiritual mainstay of our army and people and deprive them of their rights to living.
					
					 The revelation of hideous terrorist attempts by the U.S. and south Korean intelligence agencies is shocking the world community.
					
					 They hatched such plots as the case of "association for bringing down statues", the "precision missile strikes" at the monuments for immortalizing the great leader in different parts of the DPRK, "beheading operation" and the "precision strike at the office of supreme leadership" in the new century.
					
					 The plot hatched by Park for terrorism based on internationally banned radio-active material and biochemical substance was the worst crime in history.
					
					 The recently revealed "operation for eliminating the leadership of the north" and "assassination plot" are hideous organized crimes that can never be pardoned.
					
					 It is crystal clear to everyone that another hideous terrorism will be attempted if those devils are allowed to be at large.
					
					 It is the resolute will of our army and people to find out at any cost and mercilessly punish those who dare challenge to the supreme leadership.
					
					 If the south Korean authorities truly want the north-south ties to be improved, they should do what they have to do with regard to the hideous state-sponsored terrorist attempts.
					
					 Not only those human scum who hatched such terrorist plot but also those who have any intention to challenge the supreme leadership will never go scot-free for a single day.
					
					 Those who dare challenge to the sun are fated to meet the divine punishment.

articles.title: U.S. Can Never Cover up Its True Colors as Provoker of Korean War: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
U.S. Can Never Cover up Its True Colors as Provoker of Korean War: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, June 30 (KCNA) -- Strange burlesque is staged in the U.S. and south Korea before and after June 25 every year.
					 Rodong Sinmun in an article Friday terms it an anti-DPRK campaign aimed to cover up the truth behind the outbreak of the Korean War in the 1950s and pass the buck for it upon the DPRK.
					
					 The article says:
					
					 With no rhetoric can the U.S. imperialists cover up their true colors as provocateur and aggressor who forced the war on the Korean nation under the cloak of U.N.
					
					 They had made careful preparations to use the cloak of U.N. for the war of aggression on the DPRK from the eve of it.
					
					 They set up a "group for drafting documents" at the U.S. Department of State to bring a complaint about "armed attack by the north Korean army" to the U.N. and "justify" the U.S. forces' total involvement. Then they drafted in advance "documents" to be presented to the UNSC and UN General Assembly and even "resolution" to be adopted there.
					
					 On June 25 when the Korean War broke out, an urgent meeting of the UNSC was convened under the U.S. imperialists' machinations and brigandish demand to railroad the U.S. "resolution", which fabricated the invasion of the north into "southward invasion", as the UNSC "resolution" 82.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists also cooked up the UNSC "resolution" 84 related to the formation of "UN forces" to introduce armed forces of 15 satellite countries in the war as planned before. Under this scenario, the U.S. imperialists and their satellite forces turned the Korean peninsula into ashes and violated the Korean nation's right to existence under the helmet of the "U.N. forces".
					
					 They provoked the Korean War in a bid to wipe out the DPRK by abusing the name of the UN, but they suffered a bitter defeat in face of the heroic Korean people only to sign the surrender document.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Says No to Japan's Revision of Law on Punishing Organized Crime
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Says No to Japan's Revision of Law on Punishing Organized Crime
 Pyongyang, June 30 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, both houses of Japan's Diet passed a draft amendment to the law on punishing organized crime. The revised law includes a provision on "crime of preparing terror" dealing with a "crime of conspiracy" to punish a crime in the stage of planning. The law is set to take effect from July.
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun Friday says that Japan's revision of the above-said law is dangerous as it is aimed to legalize strict monitoring and political crackdown upon media and progressive forces at home under the pretext of preventing terror and crime and thus accelerate the militarist fascistization.
					
					 It is the political aim of the Japanese ruling quarters to revive the hideous fascist system and call back the departed soul of the era of Japanese imperialism, the paper says, and goes on:
					
					 Prompted by such sinister scheme, the Japanese reactionaries had retrogressively revised or cooked up lots of fascist laws in recent years
					
					 Peace and security in the Asia-Pacific region are put at peril when the fascist system is consolidated in Japan. It is by no means fortuitous that international public is branding the revision of the law on punishing organized crime as a reckless move for speeding up the military fascistization. 
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries should be mindful that militarization and fascistization will bring to them only the same miserable fate as Tojo and Hitler's.
					
					 They would be well advised to cool their heads heated by militarism and behave with prudence and self-control.

articles.title: Sycophancy and Submission to U.S. Lead to Ruin: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Sycophancy and Submission to U.S. Lead to Ruin: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, June 30 (KCNA) -- The present south Korean regime professing "democratic reform" is claiming that the "alliance" with the U.S. is the "backbone of its diplomatic and security policies", "security signboard guaranteeing the prosperity of Northeast Asia" and "the most successful one".
					 Rodong Sinmun says in a commentary Friday that the south Korea-U.S. "alliance" is, in essence, no more than a lever for domination and subordination and noose of submission.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The real ruler of south Korea is none other than the U.S. who maintains all power there.
					
					 South Korea is a colony of the U.S. as it has neither actual power nor prerogative over the army and its economy and culture depend on others.
					
					 The shameful history of south Korea-U.S. "alliance" which has lasted for more than a half century was a vicious cycle of tragedy in which the pro-U.S. lackeys offered all benefits of the nation to their master amid the U.S. colonial domination over south Korea getting tightened.
					
					 It is the south Korea-U.S. "alliance" that resulted in the vicious cycle of catastrophic north-south relations. The U.S. has persistently checked the improvement of the north-south relations, swayed by misgivings that such improvement would make it lose justification for its military presence in south Korea and an advanced base to militarily contain big powers of Northeast Asia and realize the ambition for global domination.
					
					 The history shows that when the "alliance" gets developed the tension of the Korean peninsula grows acuter and the distrust and confrontation between the north and the south are getting serious.
					
					 Sycophancy and submission to the U.S. leads to ruin and the national independence is the only way out.

articles.title: Minju Joson Flails S. Korean Conservative Group's Attempt at Hideous Terrorism
articles.content:
Minju Joson Flails S. Korean Conservative Group's Attempt at Hideous Terrorism
 Pyongyang, June 30 (KCNA) -- The recently disclosed hideous state-sponsored terrorist attempt by the conservative group of south Korea is a clear thrice-cursed organized crime targeting the supreme leadership of the DPRK, says Minju Joson in a commentary Friday.
					 It is quite natural to promptly execute those criminals who hatched such heinous plot to hurt the supreme leadership of the DPRK, not content with all sorts of schemes to attain their ambition for "unification of systems", the commentary says, and goes on:
					
					 We have already declared that we would ferret out and mete out merciless punishment to the last one those who organized, took part and pursued the hideous state-sponsored terrorism, even by ransacking the whole earth, no matter wherever they are.
					
					 It is the unanimous demand of our army and people to find out at any cost and promptly and mercilessly cut to pieces Park Geun Hye and Ri Pyong Ho group who invented the hideous scheme aimed at the DPRK supreme leadership that represents the DPRK's dignity and mightiness and their destiny and life.
					
					 If the south Korean authorities worry about the bedeviled north-south relations getting worse, they should hand over traitor Park Geun Hye and Ri Pyong Ho and their groups, the organizers of the hideous state-sponsored terrorism, to the DPRK at once under international convention and laws and legislations.
					
					 They have to judge themselves what consequences will be entailed in case they turn down this crucial demand related to the dignity of the DPRK supreme leadership.

articles.title: Unjust Assertion of Unification Ministry Rejected in S. Korea
articles.content:
Unjust Assertion of Unification Ministry Rejected in S. Korea 
 Pyongyang, June 30 (KCNA) -- A organization of south Korea rejected the Ministry of Unification's assertion aimed to check the repatriation of the detained DPRK women citizens on June 25, according to the south Korean internet paper Jaju Sibo.
					 The organization termed the answer, given by the Ministry of Unification on June 23 as regards the demand of the north for the repatriation of Kim Ryon Hui and 12 women citizens of the DPRK detained in south Korea, just the same as the one given by the past Park Geun Hye regime.
					
					 It stressed that the "government" should repatriate those women on the principle of protection of human rights and humanitarianism without any political consideration.

articles.title: Japan Denounced for Checking Erection of Statue of Girl Sexual Slave
articles.content:
Japan Denounced for Checking Erection of Statue of Girl Sexual Slave
 Pyongyang, June 30 (KCNA) -- The Council for the Solution of the Issue of the Volunteers Corps in south Korea released a statement on June 27, accusing the Japanese government of covering up the inhumane war crimes.
					 The statement charged that the Japanese government's attempt to check the erection of statue of sexual slave is getting intensified while the statues have been built in south Korea and different countries for 26 years.
					
					 Japan's consulate general to Atlanta bribed the mayor and the council of the city into checking the building of the statue, it disclosed.
					
					 The statement said that the present government should strongly condemn such reckless action of Japanese politicians and urge the Japanese government to admit its crimes and make official apology and legal reparation for them.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Slovenia
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Slovenia
 Pyongyang, June 30 (KCNA) -- A Slovenian committee for remembering President Kim Il Sung was inaugurated in Maribor City on June 19.
					 Igor Jurisic, chairman of the Slovenia-Korea Friendship Association, was elected chairman of the committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize political and cultural events praising the revolutionary career and exploits of the President from June 20 to July 10.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Denmark
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Denmark
 Pyongyang, June 30 (KCNA) -- A committee for remembering President Kim Il Sung was formed in Copenhagen of Denmark on June 20.
					 Anders Kristensen, chairman of the Denmark-DPRK Friendship Association, and H. Jacobsen, member of the Leadership of the Communist Party in Denmark, were elected as co-chairmen of the above-said committee.

articles.title: Nigerian National Committee for Remembering Kim Il Sung Formed
articles.content:
Nigerian National Committee for Remembering Kim Il Sung Formed
 Pyongyang, June 30 (KCNA) -- A Nigerian national committee for remembering President Kim Il Sung was formed in Abuja on June 20.
					 Ibrahim Mantu, member of the Credit Committee of the People's Democratic Party of Nigeria and chairman of the Nigeria-Korea Friendship Association, was elected chairman of the above-said committee.
					
					 The committee decided to give wide publicity to the revolutionary feats of the President for the cause of global independence and hold a remembrance meeting, a film show and other political and cultural events on the occasion of the 23rd anniversary of his demise.

articles.title: Portavoz del MINREX rechaza difamacion de EE.UU. en el tema de "trafico de personas"
articles.content:
Portavoz del MINREX rechaza difamacion de EE.UU. en el tema de "trafico de personas"
Pyongyang, 30 de junio (ACNC) -- A la pregunta formulada el dia 30 por un reportero de la ACNC en relacion con que recientemente, Estados Unidos acuso a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea en el llamado "reporte sobre el trafico de personas" de 2017, el portavoz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la RPDC respondio como sigue:
					EE.UU., pais condenado unanimemente por la sociedad internacional como peor tierra del mundo para los derechos humanos y capo de traficantes de personas, volvio a inventar atrevidamente el estado del "trafico de personas" en otros paises actuando como si fuera "juez de DDHH".
					
					En particular, el secretario de Estado norteamericano Tillerson suele difamar a la RPDC por estos dias y uso esta vez la expresion "trabajo forzado" para insultar a los trabajadores norcoreanos que laboran segun el contrato legitimo firmado con otros paises.
					
					Este hecho demuestra claramente a que fase llegan las imprudentes maniobras de la administracion Trump para aislar y atropellar a la RPDC.
					
					Si el secretario de Estado piensa que podria danar a la RPDC mediante la ofensiva de "DDHH" y sancion, no habria otro remedio que considerarlo como ignorante que no tiene ni un poco del sentido de realidad.
					
					Si bien los fulanos y menganos de la camarilla de Trump como Tillerson no se cansan de hablar del problema de "DDHH" y recrudecen la campana de sancion, consideramos esta conducta como ultimo pataleo de los moribundos y alarido de los atemorizados ante el creciente poderio de la RPDC. 
					
					Los compinches de Trump deben aprender la leccion merecida del antecedente de la horda de Obama que sufrio un golpe fuerte cuando intentaba ofender la maxima dignidad de la RPDC acusandola del problema de "DDHH".
					
					En vez de tratar de dar lecciones al mundo con el "reporte del trafico de personas", papel mojado que fabrica anualmente con mucho trabajo, EE.UU. debera limpiar primero el territorio propio, escondrijo de todas las maldades y crimenes, tales como el asesinato, el saqueo y el trafico de personas. 
					
					El ejercito y pueblo coreanos observan agudamente las cada dia mas imprudentes muestras de la fiebre conflictiva anti-RPDC de la pandilla de Trump manteniendo la firme voluntad de castigar sin piedad a todos los malvados como Tillerson. 
					
					 A EE.UU. le convendria tambien actuar con juicio.

articles.title: AEDHC rechaza tonterias de una entidad intrigante de "DDHH" anti-RPDC
articles.content:
AEDHC rechaza tonterias de una entidad intrigante de "DDHH" anti-RPDC
Pyongyang, 30 de junio (ACNC) -- A la pregunta formulada hoy por un reportero de la ACNC con respecto a que la "Coalicion Internacional para Frenar los Crimenes de Lesa Humanidad en el Norte de Corea" dijo con siniestro objetivo politico unas tonterias que tergiversan gravemente la realidad de la RPDC, el vocero de la Asociacion de Estudio de Derechos Humanos de Corea (AEDHC) dio la siguiente respuesta:
					Recientemente, la "Coalicion Internacional para Frenar los Crimenes de Lesa Humanidad en el Norte de Corea", entidad intrigante de "DDHH" anti-RPDC, enumero por conducto de un miembro los datos totalmente inventados como que fue importada violando la sancion de la ONU la mayoria de los equipos del Campo de Esqui Masikryong, se usa en la operacion del mismo la "fuerza laboral de ninos esclavos" y murieron en un accidente de omnibus 30 jovenes que viajaban a ese lugar de recreo.
					
					Constituyen un acto imperdonable y sucio esas mentiras puras dichas al Comite Olimpico Internacional y la sociedad internacional.
					
					El Campo de Esqui Masikryong es para el uso publico al igual que en muchos paises.
					
					Si fueran importados en violacion de la sancion de la ONU los equipos del campo que estan a disposicion de todo el pueblo, la misma sancion de la ONU constituye de veras un gravisimo crimen de lesa humanidad que impide el fomento de la constitucion fisica y la vida civilizada de las masas populares.

articles.title: Portavoz de CRN demanda castigo mas duro a entidades ultraderechistas surcoreanas
articles.content:
Portavoz de CRN demanda castigo mas duro a entidades ultraderechistas surcoreanas
Pyongyang, 30 de junio (ACNC) -- El portavoz del Consejo de Reconciliacion Nacional hizo publica el dia 30 una declaracion en relacion con que en estos dias, se hace cada vez mas fuerte en el Sur de Corea la atmosfera de condena y repudio a las entidades conservadoras ultraderechistas que corren el riesgo de arruinamiento con motivo de la destitucion de la traidora Park Geun-hye.
					Como es conocido, durante el mandato de Park, esas entidades justificaron la politica traidora de las autoridades bajo el respaldo del poder y usando hasta la violencia de gangster, estropearon e insultaron gravemente la lucha de la poblacion surcoreana por el derecho a sobrevivir y la democracia, comienza la nota y continua:
					
					En particular, actuaron como brazos de Park en levantar la ola de enfrentamiento con la RPDC, inclusive la campana de difamacion a esta y la "purga de las fuerzas izquierdistas pro-Norte".
					
					Es muy natural que las entidades conservadoras ultraderechistas, que antes armaban tumultos de toda indole desafiando a la opinion publica, se encuentren ahora en la crisis de desintegracion siendo objetos de liquidacion de males segun la demanda unanime de la poblacion surcoreana.
					
					Cada vez que enfrentaba la seria crisis de gobernacion, la traidora Park Geun-hye vociferaba que "todas las entidades conservadoras deben acudir a la lucha con las fuerzas unidas" y "prepararse para la batalla frente a la accion pro-Norte y antigubernamental de las entidades izquierdistas". Para colmo, decreto a las entidades conservadoras la "orden de movilizacion general" y les empujo a la "demostracion de control" financiandolas con millones de dolares extorsionados cada ano de los consorcios.
					
					A su vez, los conservadores peleaban entre si por el mayor dinero que les tiraba Chongwadae y cometieron todas las maldades insultando la opinion publica.
					
					Es merecido que esos tipejos, quienes sin conciencia ni honor del ser humano, perseguian solo el poder y el lucro, se dispersaran ahora en busca de su salvacion ya que perdieron la fuente de ingreso junto con la ruina de su patrona Park.
					
					La dispersion y derrumbe de las entidades conservadoras es el resultado que corresponde a las escorias humanas que mantenian su sucia vida con el servilismo a grandes potencias, actos de confrontacion fratricida y sumision ciega al poder.
					
					Hay que enterrar a tiempo los desechos apestosos.
					
					Hace falta esclarecer en esta oportunidad el expediente de acciones antinacionales y antipopulares y la verdad de todos los males cometidos por Park Geun-hye y Choe Sun Sil, autoras del reciente escandalo politico que causo la consternacion de nacionales y extranjeros, y tambien por las entidades conservadoras ultraderechistas. 
					
					A base de ello, hay que sentenciarles severamente en nombre de la historia.

articles.title: Ri Yong Ho se reune con el nuevo embajador de Nepal
articles.content:
Ri Yong Ho se reune con el nuevo embajador de Nepal
Pyongyang, 30 de junio (ACNC) -- El ministro de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Ri Yong Ho, converso el dia 29 con el nuevo embajador extraordinario y plenipotenciario de la Republica Democratica Federal de Nepal en Corea, Leela Mani Paudyal, quien le hizo una visita de cortesia.
					Tras referirse a la justeza y vitalidad de la linea del Partido del Trabajo de Corea de impulsar simultaneamente la construccion economica y la de fuerzas armadas nucleares, el canciller coreano expreso la esperanza de que se fortaleceran y se desarrollaran en el futuro tambien las tradicionales relaciones de amistad y cooperacion Corea-Nepal conforme a los intereses de los gobiernos y pueblos de ambos paises.
					
					Diciendo que se debe resolver por via pacifica el problema de la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana, el embajador nepales manifesto la voluntad de esforzarse mucho durante su mandato para ampliar en varias esferas las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre ambos paises que tienen larga historia y tradicion.

articles.title: Llega a Pyongyang la delegacion de union juvenil de Rusia
articles.content:
Llega a Pyongyang la delegacion de union juvenil de Rusia
Pyongyang, 30 de junio (ACNC) -- Arribo el dia 30 a esta capital la delegacion de la Union de la Juventud Comunista Lenin de la Federacion Rusa presidida por el primer secretario del CC de la UJC, Vladimir Isakov quien es el secretario del Comite Central del Partido Comunista de la FR.
